details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.5.29 Formula - Non-math formula
details.description: Non-mathematical scientific formula enclosed within Formula structure elements shall have either an Alt entry or an ActualText entry in its structure element dictionary

rule.description: Non-mathematical scientific formula enclosed within Formula structure elements shall have either an Alt entry or an ActualText entry in its structure element dictionary
rule.test: Alt != null || ActualText != null || isMathFormula == true

error.message: A non-mathematical scientific formula enclosed within Formula structure elements contains neither Alt nor ActualText entry in its structure element dictionary
